Children living in the slums are also provided nutritious food, medicines and clothing free of cost. The other objective of the Trust is the instituting of Secondary, Primary and Middle level schools for offering free education to the poor and street children. All the support and indoctrination required are offered by National Child Relief Services while addressing epidemics related to AIDs and HIV. To agencies in the private sector, governments of developing nations and non-government organizations, the Trust provides white-collar and technical assistance as well as all-embracing training. The Trust also designs, manages and evaluates all-inclusive prevention of HIV and AIDS, offers support and care sequencers and also provides answerability in management of finances and the results of the programs, both. Some of the relief measures taken by National Child Relief Services

sourceOfFunds.purpose: National Child Relief Services is involved in a number of relief programs for the betterment of the lives of poor Indian children. The Trust takes up appropriate measures and adopts suitable programs for rehabilitating people in different circumstances.

Where programs for food relief are carried out, blankets and clothes are also distributed by this NGO, free of cost. You can check out the photos on the website to get an idea. Many of the poor children come in old shorts and some have hardly any clothing to wear. They are provided clothes by National Child Relief Services Distribution of Free Medicines The poor and needy children are distributed free medication in the relief programs offering medicine. ngoList.actName: Section 29 of the Bombay Public Trust Act, 1950
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The National HRD Network (NHRDN), established in 1986, is the leading National Apex body of HR professionals committed to promoting the HRD movement in the country and enhancing the capability of human resource professionals to global levels, while simultaneously enabling them to make an impactful contribution in enhancing competitiveness and creating value for Society. Over the past three decades, this institution has been built and mentored by outstanding leaders and committed office bearers who have embraced the mission of creating an unparalleled network of Human Resource professionals who can contribute meaningfully and in a value-added manner to the process of organization and nation building. NHRDN has approximately 12500 Professional Members and more than 1200 Corporate Institutional Members, with an all-India network of 30 chapters, and has global linkages with institutions like the Ross Business School, University of Michigan USA, Wharton Business School USA, Fudan University China, Society of Human Resource Management (SHRM) USA, and many others.

ngoList.ngoName: Pujya Kanshi Ram Jain Girls High School Managing Committee Ambala City
ngoList.address: P.K.R. Jain Girls Sr. Sec. School, Arya Chowk
ngoList.title: Pujya Kanshi Ram Jain Girls High School Managing Committee Ambala City
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: A Trust named after the revered Jain Acharya Pujya Kanshi Ram Ji Maharaj was established in the year 1950 as P.K.R. Jain Girls High School Managing Committee. Initially a school namely P.K.R. Jain Girls High School was started with a handful of girl students which at present caters to more than 2500 girls of the Ambala region, affiliated to H.B.S.E, Haryana. Encouraged by the response, the harbingers of this pious institution established another co-educational Public School, affiliated with C.B.S.E having a strength of app. 3200 students. Again our trust established one more co-educational day boarding school also affiliated with C.B.S.E having app. 1600 students and a College of Education which is a very well-known nursery of future educators in B.Ed. and M.Ed. courses. The trust works and follows the age old doctrines given by our revered Maharaj ji, Kam Khao, Gam Khao Nam Jao. It diligently strives to work for weakest members of the society and stresses on value education, character building and integrity in the pupils to produce complete citizens for a strong and developed nation. The groups various achievements include many State Level as well as National Awards for the Principals & Faculty Members. This inculcates the feeling of pride in personal and group achievements. It plans the academia in such a way that the students and pupil teachers get exposure to activities that develop self-esteem and encourage lateral and creative thinking. Our institution is a perfect combination of enlightenment of soul, spiritual guidance and modern education in the present context of digitalized education. We take pride in the nationalistic spirit and instill feelings of nationalism, patriotism and work for the building up of a caring society. Along with the implementation of the education system as prescribed by the authorities, small learning communities, career academics, team teaching etc. are used for multi-disciplinary learning. It celebrates different cultural backgrounds and create systems to allow all members to showcase their potential by a plethora of activities like folk songs and folk dances, theatrics, literary quizzes and debates, cultural and annual functions etc. We also take initiatives at various levels so that various schemes being introduced by the state are intimated to all the sections of society and they get maximum benefits from them. We encourage strategies to increase academic engagement by ensuring proper teacher training, in-service opportunities and various assessment methods to meet the needs of our students. From time to time, instructional improvement workshops for faculty development in which teachers learn how to give positive instructions. The trust has completed large scale infra-structure improvement projects well in time and has very recently taken up a new project namely Charitable Medical Diagnostic Center for X-ray, Digital X-ray, MRI, Cat Scan etc. along-with modernized laboratory equipped with state-of-the-art Machinery, procured from internationally acclaimed Companies. The Building and other Infrastructure is on the verge of completion and most of the Medical equipment and Machinery have been installed and we hope to inaugurate it with in a short time.
